activities: PlumChoice, Inc. (together with its subsidiaries, "PlumChoice") delivers consumer technology support services using software developed by or on behalf of PlumChoice as well as third party software.  These services may be delivered by or on behalf of PlumChoice or its contractors and/or business partners.  In providing these services, PlumChoice may receive and maintain information voluntarily provided by end users, including name, address, phone number, e-mail address, password and payment card information, as well as information about the personal computers and other electronic devices used by end users.  PlumChoice may also collect personal information from employees, candidates and contingent workers as part of its human resources programs.
contactoff1: Cross Point, 900 Chelmsford Street, Lowell, MA  01851
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data, data about a customer's electronic device and human resource data
recoursemech: For human resources data:  EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).  For all other types of data:  International Centre for Dispute Resolution (ICDR) A Division of the American Arbitration Association (AAA) 1101 Laurel Oak Road, Suite 100 Voorhees, NJ 08043 Phone: 856-435-6401 Email box: casefiling@adr.org
